--- select_tablesample_with_unnest_invalid.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[(1, 'foo'), (3, 'bar')]) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Unnest{
        Unnest:   18,
        Rparen:   81,
        Implicit: false,
        Expr:     &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  25,
          Lbrack: 57,
          Rbrack: 80,
          Type:   &ast.StructType{
            Struct: 31,
            Gt:     55,
            Fields: []*ast.StructField{
              &ast.StructField{
                Ident: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 38,
                  NameEnd: 39,
                  Name:    "x",
                },
                Type: &ast.SimpleType{
                  NamePos: 40,
                  Name:    "INT64",
                },
              },
              &ast.StructField{
                Ident: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 47,
                  NameEnd: 48,
                  Name:    "y",
                },
                Type: &ast.SimpleType{
                  NamePos: 49,
                  Name:    "STRING",
                },
              },
            },
          },
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.StructLiteral{
              Struct: 0,
              Lparen: 58,
              Rparen: 67,
              Fields: []*ast.StructField{},
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 59,
                  ValueEnd: 60,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                &ast.StringLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 62,
                  ValueEnd: 67,
                  Value:    "foo",
                },
              },
            },
            &ast.StructLiteral{
              Struct: 0,
              Lparen: 70,
              Rparen: 79,
              Fields: []*ast.StructField{},
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 71,
                  ValueEnd: 72,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "3",
                },
                &ast.StringLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 74,
                  ValueEnd: 79,
                  Value:    "bar",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
        Hint:       (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:         (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        WithOffset: (*ast.WithOffset)(nil),
        Sample:     &ast.TableSample{
          TableSample: 83,
          Method:      "BERNOULLI",
          Size:        &ast.TableSampleSize{
            Lparen: 105,
            Rparen: 116,
            Value:  &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 106,
              ValueEnd: 108,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "90",
            },
            Unit: "PERCENT",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[STRUCT(1, "foo"), STRUCT(3, "bar")]) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
